      • combineTagLists

        public static net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagList combineTagLists(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagList tagList1,
                                                           net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagList tagList2,
                                                           java.lang.String stringCompKey,
                                                           java.lang.String intCompKey,
                                                           java.lang.String intAddKey,
                                                           java.lang.String doubleAddKey,
                                                           java.lang.String fracAddKey)
        Combines two NBTTagLists, adding numerical values of tags with matching identifiers.
        Parameters:
        tagList1 - The first NBTTagList
        tagList2 - The second NBTTagList
        stringCompKey - The key of the String identifier
        intCompKey - The key of the int identifier
        intAddKey - The key of the int to be added
        doubleAddKey - The key of the double to be added
        fracAddKey - The key of the int array fraction to be added
        Returns:
        The resulting NBTTagList
